title: UI: Add note action
description:
Add note form in detail panel:
- Textarea for note content
- Submit button
- htmx POST to /api/ticks/:id/note
- Note appears in history immediately
- Clear form on success

AGENT VERIFICATION:
- Use agent-browser to open any tick
- Enter a test note
- Submit and verify it appears in notes list
- Take screenshot

HUMAN REVIEW:
- URL: http://localhost:3000 (open any tick)
- Add a note and verify formatting
